description: Test suite for the MySQLTemplate in the universalinit project, including fixtures, setup, and various unit tests for project initialization, configuration loading, template variable replacement, and post-processing execution.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration and template files for testing.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a sample project configuration for testing.

methods.name: test_mysql_init_info
methods.description: Verifies that the template's initial information is correctly retrieved.

methods.name: test_project_initialization
methods.description: Tests the project initialization process and verifies output files and content.

methods.name: test_default_parameters
methods.description: Checks that default parameters are correctly applied when none are provided.

methods.name: test_mysql_root_user
methods.description: Ensures the default MySQL user is 'root' and password is as specified.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading
methods.description: Tests loading project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_entry_point_url
methods.description: Verifies the correctness of the generated entry point URL.

methods.name: test_docker_compose_yaml_structure
methods.description: Checks the structure of the generated docker-compose.yml file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement
methods.description: Ensures template variables are correctly replaced in output files.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution
methods.description: Verifies that post-processing scripts are executed properly.

methods.name: test_mysql_specific_features
methods.description: Tests MySQL-specific features such as password handling.
